pages.title: A simple network
pages.text:
To define a new network place a $(l:1_items/master_spark)&1Master Corporea Spark&0$(/l) on top of an empty inventory.
This inventory will not be accessible from the network. Next add inventories to the network by placing $(l:1_items/spark)&5Corporea Sparks&0$(/l) on them. The maximum range between sparks is &415 blocks&0.
To visualize the network, right click a spark with your &1Wand of the Forest&0.
